loops-code-question7_key2: Ab hum `loops` ka use karke ek game banayenge. Iss game ko hum "**guessing game**" bolte hai.
loops-code-question7_key3: Iss game mein humare pass pehle se ek number hota hai. Abhi ke liye maan lo yeh **number 5**     hai.
loops-code-question7_key4: Uske baad hum user se **1 se 10** ke beech mein ek **number `input`** lete hai. Phir user humare number ko guess karni ki koshish karta hai.
loops-code-question7_key5: Jaise, agar user ne 3 `input` kiya. Hum check karenge ki kya 3, 5 ke barabar hai?
loops-code-question7_key6: 3, 5 ke barabar nahi hai isliye hum user se phir koi number `input` lenge.
loops-code-question7_key7: Aur check karenge ki kya woh number 5 ke barabar hai?
loops-code-question7_key8: User ko **5 chances** milenge number guess karne ke liye.
loops-code-question7_key9: Agar usne 5 chances mein number guess kar liya toh sahi hai, nahi toh ek message aa jayega ki user ne guess nahi kiya.
loops-code-question7_key10: **Hint: `Python` mein ek break `statement` hoti hai. Iske baare mein Google kar ke padh lo.**
